attributes.action: leave the house of lords as it is. as an appointed system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: an elected system would not work as there would be few people willing to do a mps job on no pay. the house of lords has help rule the land fairly for hundreds of years doing so with no money and very little power since the house of lords act. what the commons is doing to the lords is destroying one of the few advantages the country has. if we appoint the best people in the land experts from all fields as we do now we are able to look at every bill from every perspective. if you use an elected system in times of crisis there will be arguing between houses like in america about the bank nationalization which has caused nothing but misery every time it is delayed
